channel.title: Guests on VMware Tanzu - Developer Advocates
channel.description: Recent content in Guests on VMware Tanzu - Developer Advocates

item.title: Dr. Dave Syer
item.description: Founder of Spring Cloud, Spring Boot, Spring Batch, lead of Spring Security OAuth, and an active contributor to Spring Integration, Spring Framework, Spring AMQP, Spring Security. Experienced, delivery-focused architect and development manager. Has designed and built successful enterprise software solutions using Spring, and implemented them in major institutions worldwide.

item.title: Spencer Gibb
item.description: Spencer is an industry veteran with experience in e-commerce platforms, government and non-profit organizations to business intelligence startups.
